name: Farmers World Wood
description: Farmers World is a NFT game to function on the WAX blockchain platform. Users can pick for suitable tools, exploit various resources, buy land to build enormous farms, and enjoy the fascinating experiences of a farmer working in Farmers Worldâ€™s Ecosystem. There are 3 main resources in Farmers World: Wood, Food and Gold corresponding to 3 tokens: FWW (Wood), FWF (Food), FWG (Gold).
